mapper.insert: INSERT ALL INTO AGENT ("NO" , "USER_NO") VALUES (SEQ_ANIMAL_WORK_NO.NEXTVAL, #{userNo}) INTO ANIMAL_WORK ("NO" , "NAME" , "CONTENT" , "DATE")VALUES(SEQ_ANIMAL_WORK_NO.NEXTVAL , #{workName} , #{workContent}, #{endDate}) SELECT * FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT AW."NO" AS WORK_NO , AW."NAME" AS WORK_NAME , AW."CONTENT" AS WORK_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(AW."DATE",'YYYY-MM-DD') AS END_DATE , A."USER_NO" FROM ANIMAL_WORK AW JOIN AGENT A ON AW.NO = A.NO WHERE USER_NO = #{no}
